name: qrcodepro
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qrcodeutils.
Tool description: QR Code Generator API. The API will return directly QR Code image. For more details please visit https://www.qrcodeutils.com
API description: Generates a professional QR code with customizable properties and settings.

text.description: The text to encode into the QR code.

validate.description: Whether to validate the input text. Defaults to None.

setlabel.description: Whether to set a label on the QR code. Defaults to None.

forecolor.description: The foreground color of the QR code in hexadecimal format without the # prefix. Defaults to '000000'.

type.description: The output file type for the QR code ('png', 'svg', or 'eps'). Defaults to 'svg'.

labeltext.description: The text to use as a label in the QR code. Defaults to None.

size.description: The size of the output image in pixels, with a maximum of 4000. Defaults to 150.

labelalign.description: The alignment of the label ('left', 'right', or 'center'). Defaults to 'center'.

backcolor.description: The background color of the QR code in hexadecimal format without the # prefix. Defaults to 'FFFFFF'.

level.description: Correction Level L (Low) 7% of codewords can be restored. Level M (Medium) 15% of codewords can be restored. Level Q (Quartile)[39] 25% of codewords can be restored. Level H (High) 30% of codewords can be restored. H,L,Q,M . Default M. H,L,Q,M . Default M
